maintainers.name: Simon Shine
maintainers.bio: I learned Tcl in the mid-1990s along with Perl. They were my first languages, and Tcl appealed especially to me because it was so easy to learn.

maintainers.name: Glenn Jackman
maintainers.bio: I've been programming in Tcl since version 8.0. I find it very refreshing to have a language that can be described in just 12 rules.
